content.description: Climb up semi-independent piece of tower on the right side of the East face by side-pulling on the arete. move a bit left at the top and top out. The moves as you shift left just before the topout are the crux.
content.protection: 4 bolts to 2 bolt anchor. If top roping you must extend these. It is best for the final person in your party to clean the anchor and rap off the anchors of Razor Blade Alley
content.location: The left (East) Side of the Jenga Tower on gradually steepening to overhanging face.

content.description: Starting on top of fallen tree head up the NW face via sharp and jagged rock. I pulled a KnifeBlade while cleaning loose rock while aiding up this before the bolts were in and got nice and cut up.
content.location: NW face of Jenga Tower starting from fallen tree.

pathTokens: Jenga Tower and Your Mom's Basement, The

content.description: The first tower just below Rose Hill Crag,looks like it is made of a jumble of blocks that could topple at any moment.
